message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100! It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased similar products. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I'm willing to take a chance, but I'll only buy it if it's high quality.

Ahaha, I knew you'd be a savvy buyer! I'm glad you're willing to take a chance. Since you're interested in a high-quality product, I'll let you know that this one has received exceptional reviews and has been thoroughly tested. It's a real showstopper! And, of course, it's still available for the same price of $100. What do you think? Will you take it home and experience the difference for yourself?
I'm not going to fall for it again. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your skepticism, Bob! But I assure you, this product is a game-changer. I'm willing to offer you a special guarantee: if you buy this product and don't love it, I'll personally come to your doorstep and pick it up. No questions asked. And, as always, it's still available for the same price of $100. What do you say? Are you willing to give it a try?
I'll take you up on your guarantee offer. I'll buy the product, but I'm keeping my fingers crossed that it's high-quality this time.

Ahaha, I knew you'd take me up on that offer! I'm glad you're excited about the guarantee. Now, let me introduce you to this next product. It's a real showstopper, and I'm confident you'll love it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a special 'low-risk' deal: if you buy this product and don't love it, I'll not only pick it up, but I'll also give you a full refund. And, as always, it's still available for the same price of $100. What do you say? Will you take the plunge?
I'm tempted by the 'low-risk' deal, but I'm not going to fall for it again. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your hesitation, Bob! But I want to assure you that this product is a great value for the price. It's a popular item among our customers, and I'm confident you'll find it useful. Will you give it a try?
I'm not interested in the free accessory, and I'm not going to fall for the same trick again. I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're being cautious, Bob! But I want to ask you a question: what's the worst that could happen if you buy this product and it doesn't meet your expectations? You'll be out $100, but you'll also get a product that might still have some value to you. And who knows, you might be surprised and find that it's not as bad as you think! Plus, I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, so you can always send it back if you're not happy. What do you say? Will you take a chance?
I'll take a chance, but only because of the 'no-questions-asked' return policy. I'll buy the product, but I'm not expecting much.

Ha! I knew you'd take a chance, Bob! And I'm glad you're open-minded. This next product is a real doozy, and I think you'll be pleasantly surprised. Will you take a chance on this one too?
I'm not falling for the 'risk-taker's discount' trick. I'll pass on this one.
